formConfigs.name: Product Form
formConfigs.description: Form for creating and editing products

rules.message: Name must be at least 3 characters

dependencies.callback: (form, values) => { if (values.salePrice > values.price) { form.setFields([{ name: 'salePrice', errors: ['Sale price cannot be higher than regular price'] }]); } }

hooks.beforeSubmit: (values) => { const processed = {...values}; if (values.images) { processed.imageUrls = values.images.map(img => img.url); } return processed; }

formConfigs.name: Order Form
formConfigs.description: Form for creating and editing orders

template.name: productId
template.label: Product
template.options: (async) => { const response = await fetch('/api/products'); return response.json().then(data => data.map(p => ({ label: p.name, value: p.id, price: p.price }))); }

dependencies.callback: (form, values, fieldName) => { const idx = fieldName.match(/\d+/)[0]; const product = form.getFieldValue(['items', idx, 'productId', 'options'])?.find(opt => opt.value === values.items[idx].productId); return product?.price || 0; }

(form, values, fieldName) => { const idx = fieldName.match(/\d+/)[0]; const quantity = Number(values.items[idx].quantity) || 0; const unitPrice = Number(values.items[idx].unitPrice) || 0; return (quantity * unitPrice).toFixed(2); }

confirmTexts.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

tableColumns.title: Category
tableColumns.render: (category) => { const categories = {electronics: 'Electronics', clothing: 'Clothing', home: 'Home & Kitchen'}; return categories[category] || category; }

tableColumns.title: Stock
tableColumns.render: (stock, record) => { if (stock <= 0) return <Tag color='red'>Out of Stock</Tag>; if (stock <= record.lowStockThreshold) return <Tag color='orange'>Low Stock: {stock}</Tag>; return <Tag color='green'>{stock}</Tag>; }

tableColumns.title: Status
tableColumns.render: (status) => { const colors = {new: 'blue', processing: 'orange', shipped: 'purple', delivered: 'green', cancelled: 'red'}; return <Tag color={colors[status] || 'blue'}>{status.toUpperCase()}</Tag>; }

tableColumns.title: Payment
tableColumns.render: (status) => { const colors = {pending: 'orange', paid: 'green', failed: 'red'}; return <Tag color={colors[status] || 'default'}>{status.toUpperCase()}</Tag>; }

validation.message: Product name must be at least 3 characters
SKU can only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens
Price must be a positive number

custom.name: getLowStock
custom.description: Get products with stock below threshold

custom.name: generateSku
custom.description: Generate unique SKU for new product
